thread.title: Heidi Klum hits back at Donald Trump with hilarious video over ’10’ row
thread.title_full: Heidi Klum hits back at Donald Trump with hilarious video over ’10’ row | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Heidi Klum hits back at Donald Trump with hilarious video over ’10’ row
text:
Other Articles Sugar, yes please! 5 reasons why it is added to foods No one thought I could carry off 'Aahalya', says Radhika Apte Oral drug to treat alcholism may be available in 5 years! Heidi Klum has hit back at Presidential candidate Donald Trump by posting a hilarious video on her Twitter and Instagram accounts after Trump said that the actress was no longer a ’10’.
In a recent interview, Donald Trump, who said that the 42-year-old Heidi Klum was no longer a ’10’, admitted that while making comments he sometimes goes too far, the People Magazine reported.
In response to his comment, ‘America’s Got Talent’ judge posted a funny video that shows when Heidi Klum wore a sign ’10’, a man donned in Donald Trump mask, comes and rips off her sign.
Heidi Klum captioned the video “#TrumpHasSpoken #sadly #9.99 #NoLongerA10 #IHadAGoodRun #donaldtrump #HeidiTrumpsTrump #BeautyIsInTheEyeOfTheBeheld”.
 18, 2015 2:38 pm
